high_descs: Move forward, turn left to face the toilet from the side.
Pick up the toilet paper on the toilet.
Turn left to face the toilet paper holder.
Put the toilet paper on the holder.
anns.task_desc: Put toilet paper on the holder.

high_descs: Go straight then turn left towards the toilet seat.
Pick up the Toilet roll from the toilet tank.
Turn right towards the toilet roll stand.
Put the toilet roll on the toilet roll stand.
anns.task_desc: Put the toilet roll to its stand.

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the toilet.
Pick the toilet paper up from the back of the toilet.
Turn back to the right and face the toilet paper holder on the wall to the right of the toilet.
Put the toilet paper on the holder on the wall.
anns.task_desc: Put toilet paper on a holder on the wall.
